history.content:
Tesla is looking for an intern to start whenever the intern is available, preferably before the end of August. 

The Role

The camera team in Tesla is seeking an intern candidate for the Image Processing/Tuning tasks. This position will be coordinated with ongoing projects including camera sensors, optics, image quality and ISP tuning.

Responsibilities

· Research in image quality, optics and ISP tuning for HDR sensors

· Assist the camera team with the development of new tools, signal and algorithm validation Qualifications

· knowledge of ISP, CMOS Image Sensors and Image Quality fundamentals

· Optical component qualification and benchmarking · MATLAB/Python programming skills on digital image processing

· Knowledge of camera components and functions

· Prior experience developing and performing lab type testing, optimization and software for camera evaluation

· PhD/MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Optics or any related field

Email fmogharehabed@tesla.com with your resume and your availability if you're interested!
history.subject: Tesla Internship Opportunity -Image Processing/Optics
